official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to provide for a fair and equitable manner of determining data compensation and sharing the costs of developing data required under the Act.
short_title: Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act Amendments of 1986

summary.text: Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act Amendments of 1986 - Amends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to establish a compensation formula based on development costs and market share for subsequent registration or new use applications of a registered pesticide. Provides that if additional data is required to support an existing registration, the registrant shall share such costs on an initial fixed sum and market share basis.

titles.title: Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act Amendments of 1986

A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to provide for a fair and equitable manner of determining data compensation and sharing the costs of developing data required under the Act.
